name: BMX VR
summary: Grab the handlebars and ride into the best VR BMX experience with realistic bike riding physics! Customize every part of your BMX bike and then ride out of the bike shop into the 6 massive open world maps! Grind the downtown benches or get massive air on the Pro BMX Park! head over to the urban skatepark for some sick lines!  Free ride the sprawling school campus, or fly through wild forest trails pump track! Master grinds, flips, wheelies, and freestyle tricks on your very own bike in BMX!
